Trees must develop deep roots in order to grow strong and produce their beauty. But we don't see the roots. We just see and enjoy the beauty. In much the same way, what goes on inside of us is like the roots of a tree.

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: God's mercy is fresh and new every morning.

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: When you begin to worry, go find something to do. Get busy being a blessing to someone; do something fruitful. Talking about your problem or sitting alone, thinking about it, does no good; it serves only to make you miserable. Above all else, remember that worrying is totally useless. Worrying will not solve your problem.

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: Depression begins with disappointment. When disappointment festers in our soul, it leads to discouragement.

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: The eagle has no fear of adversity. We need to be like the eagle and have a fearless spirit of a conqueror!

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: No matter what has happened to you in the past or what is going on in your life right now, it has no power to keep you from having an amazingly good future if you will walk by faith in God. Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer
Quotes: If someone decides they're not going to be happy, it's not your problem. You don't have to spend your time and energy trying to cheer up someone who has already decided to stay in a bad mood. Believe it or not, you can actually hurt people by playing into their self-pity.

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Joyce Meyer

Name: Nikola Tesla

Name: Nikola Tesla

Name: Robert Baden-Powell

Name: Steven Wright

Name: Steven Wright
Quotes: I have an existential map. It has 'You are here' written all over it.

Name: Steven Wright

Name: Steven Wright

Name: Steven Wright

Name: Steven Wright

Name: Steven Wright
Quotes: I like to reminisce with people I don't know.

Name: Steven Wright
Quotes: What a nice night for an evening.

Name: Steven Wright
Quotes: If you saw a heat wave, would you wave back?

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: I am pretty fearless, and you know why? Because I don't handle fear very well; I'm not a good terrified person.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: If you want to find somebody and you want to be married and you want to have children, don't make it a rock star.

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: Right now I'm not involved with anybody, but I hope by 75 I will be again.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: Do you want to be an artist and a writer, or a wife and a lover? With kids, your focus changes. I don't want to go to PTA meetings.

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: When you're rich and famous you are the dominant force in a relationship, even if you try hard not to be. I've talked of sacrificing everything for Fleetwood Mac, but I realize now that it is simply the only thing I've ever wanted to do.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: When you're in a band with three writers, three great writers, you only get one third of the writer thing. So that's the whole reason that I did a solo career. And that's, you know, when I told Fleetwood Mac I was going to do that, they were of course terrified that I would do that record and then that I would quit.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: My generation fought very hard for feminism, and we fought very hard to not be labeled as you had to have a husband or you had to be in a relationship, or you were somehow not a cool chick.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: I was not going to be a stupid girl singer. I was going to be way more than that.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: Men are going to go out on the road and they're going to find other women. So if you really want to save yourself a whole lot of heartache, do not fall in love with somebody in a band. Just don't.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: By the time I was five, I was a little diva.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: If you're an unattractive girl who's trying to be beautiful with Botox, forget it. If you are a beautiful girl who's trying to be beautiful with Botox, you will look like you're angry all the time.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: I didn't want to look like anyone else - like Janis Joplin or Grace Slick. That's why I never went to any of the big designers.

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: Everything on this record is what I really wanted to say, and I'm back to being the poet I always thought I was.

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: He and I were about as compatible as a rat and a boa constrictor.

Name: Stevie Nicks

Name: Stevie Nicks
Quotes: I made a conscious decision that I was not going to have children. I didn't want others raising them, and looking after them myself would get in the way of being a musician and writer.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Know your enemy and know yourself and you can fight a hundred battles without disaster.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Pretend inferiority and encourage his arrogance.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: He will win who knows when to fight and when not to fight.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Be extremely subtle, even to the point of formlessness. Be extremely mysterious, even to the point of soundlessness. Thereby you can be the director of the opponent's fate.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys; look on them as your own beloved sons, and they will stand by you even unto death.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: A good commander is benevolent and unconcerned with fame.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: The art of war is of vital importance to the state. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin. Hence it is a subject of inquiry which can on no account be neglected.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Confront them with annihilation, and they will then survive; plunge them into a deadly situation, and they will then live. When people fall into danger, they are then able to strive for victory.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Quickness is the essence of the war.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: To fight and conquer in all our battles is not supreme excellence; supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: He will win whose army is animated by the same spirit throughout all its ranks.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: The general who wins the battle makes many calculations in his temple before the battle is fought. The general who loses makes but few calculations beforehand.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: If your opponent is of choleric temper, irritate him.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: He who knows when he can fight and when he cannot, will be victorious.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: Hence that general is skilful in attack whose opponent does not know what to defend; and he is skilful in defense whose opponent does not know what to attack.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: The quality of decision is like the well-timed swoop of a falcon which enables it to strike and destroy its victim.

Name: Sun Tzu
Quotes: The good fighters of old first put themselves beyond the possibility of defeat, and then waited for an opportunity of defeating the enemy.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less.

Name: Susan B. Anthony

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: The day may be approaching when the whole world will recognize woman as the equal of man.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: It was we, the people; not we, the white male citizens; nor yet we, the male citizens; but we, the whole people, who formed the Union. Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: There never will be complete equality until women themselves help to make laws and elect lawmakers.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: An oligarchy of race, where the Saxon rules the African, might be endured; but this oligarchy of sex which makes father, brothers, husband, sons, the oligarchs over the mother and sisters, the wife and daughters of every household... carries discord and rebellion into every home of the nation.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: I do not demand equal pay for any women save those who do equal work in value. Scorn to be coddled by your employers; make them understand that you are in their service as workers, not as women.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: Independence is happiness.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: She who succeeds in gaining the mastery of the bicycle will gain the mastery of life.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: The older I get, the greater power I seem to have to help the world; I am like a snowball - the further I am rolled the more I gain.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: No man is good enough to govern any woman without her consent.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: I think the girl who is able to earn her own living and pay her own way should be as happy as anybody on earth. The sense of independence and security is very sweet.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: I have given my life and all I am to it, and now I want my last act to be to give it all I have, to the last cent.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: I will cut off this right arm of mine before I will ask for the ballot for the Negro and not for the woman.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: Oh, if I could but live another century and see the fruition of all the work for women! There is so much yet to be done.

Name: Susan B. Anthony

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: Organize, agitate, educate, must be our war cry.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: There is not a woman born who desires to eat the bread of dependence.

Name: Susan B. Anthony

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: No self-respecting woman should wish or work for the success of a party who ignores her sex.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: Failure is impossible.

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.

Name: Susan B. Anthony

Name: Susan B. Anthony

Name: Susan B. Anthony

Name: Susan B. Anthony
Quotes: For every betrayed woman, there is always the betrayer, man.

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda

Name: Swami Vivekananda
Quotes: Never think there is anything impossible for the soul. It is the greatest heresy to think so. If there is sin, this is the only sin; to say that you are weak, or others are weak.

Name: Swami Vivekananda
Quotes: As different streams having different sources all mingle their waters in the sea, so different tendencies, various though they appear, crooked or straight, all lead to God.

Quotes: Indecision and reveries are the anesthetics of constructive action.

Name: Sylvia Plath
Quotes: There must be quite a few things that a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them.

Name: Sylvia Plath
Quotes: What I want back is what I was.

Name: Sylvia Plath

Name: Sylvia Plath
Quotes: Poetry, I feel, is a tyrannical discipline. You've got to go so far so fast in such a small space; you've got to burn away all the peripherals.

Name: Sylvia Plath
Quotes: There is an increasing market for mental hospital stuff. I am a fool if I don't relive it, recreate it.

Name: Sylvia Plath

Name: Sylvia Plath

Name: Sylvia Plath
Quotes: I am a victim of introspection.

Name: T. D. Jakes

Quotes: I chose to present myself as one who comes from among the people, and I can be touched by their pain because I have my own.

Name: T. D. Jakes

Name: T. D. Jakes

Name: T. D. Jakes

Name: T. D. Jakes
Quotes: I'm for people bettering themselves, no matter who they are and where they are, doing all they can to be all they can be.

Name: T. D. Jakes
Quotes: When my father died, I had a real experience with Christ, a real conversion with Christ and I had it in a Oneness church.

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: So the darkness shall be the light, and the stillness the dancing.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: Home is where one starts from.

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: If you aren't in over your head, how do you know how tall you are?

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: For love would be love of the wrong thing; there is yet faith, But the faith and the love and the hope are all in the waiting.

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: The most important thing for poets to do is to write as little as possible.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: Where is all the knowledge we lost with information?

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: Anxiety is the hand maiden of creativity.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: I will show you fear in a handful of dust.

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: You are the music while the music lasts.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: Wait without thought, for you are not ready for thought.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: Half of the harm that is done in this world is due to people who want to feel important. They don't mean to do harm. But the harm does not interest them.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: I have measured out my life with coffee spoons.

Name: T. S. Eliot
Quotes: It's strange that words are so inadequate. Yet, like the asthmatic struggling for breath, so the lover must struggle for words.

Name: Tariq Ramadan

Name: Tariq Ramadan
Quotes: Ramadan is, in its essence, a month of humanist spirituality.

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin
Quotes: One of my sensory problems was hearing sensitivity, where certain loud noises, such as a school bell, hurt my ears. It sounded like a dentist drill going through my ears.

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin

Name: Temple Grandin
Quotes: I like to figure things out and solve problems.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: You carry Mother Earth within you. She is not outside of you. Mother Earth is not just your environment. In that insight of inter-being, it is possible to have real communication with the Earth, which is the highest form of prayer.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: If we are peaceful, if we are happy, we can smile, and everyone in our family, our entire society, will benefit from our peace.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: True self is non-self, the awareness that the self is made only of non-self elements. There's no separation between self and other, and everything is interconnected. Once you are aware of that you are no longer caught in the idea that you are a separate entity.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: Meditation can help us embrace our worries, our fear, our anger; and that is very healing. We let our own natural capacity of healing do the work.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: To meditate means to go home to yourself. Then you know how to take care of the things that are happening inside you, and you know how to take care of the things that happen around you.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: When we recognise the virtues, the talent, the beauty of Mother Earth, something is born in us, some kind of connection, love is born.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: We will be more successful in all our endeavors if we can let go of the habit of running all the time, and take little pauses to relax and re-center ourselves. And we'll also have a lot more joy in living.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: Many people are alive but don't touch the miracle of being alive.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: It's very important that we re-learn the art of resting and relaxing. Not only does it help prevent the onset of many illnesses that develop through chronic tension and worrying; it allows us to clear our minds, focus, and find creative solutions to problems.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: Fearlessness is not only possible, it is the ultimate joy. When you touch nonfear, you are free.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quotes: You are a child of the sun, you come from the sun, and that is something true with the Earth also... your relationship with the Earth is so deep, and the Earth is in you and this is something not very difficult, much less difficult then philosophy.

Name: Thich Nhat Hanh

Quotes: One of the first duties of the physician is to educate the masses not to take medicine.

Name: William Osler

Name: Woodrow Wilson
